title.narrative: EuropeAid - Strengthening of social organisations for the construction of democratic societies for the right to housing and adequate housing in El Salvador. Own contribution - El Salvador

description.narrative: Consolidation of the project work team, conformation of the Management Committee, preparation of work, expenses, visibility and communications plan; meetings developed to address strategic issues of implementation; presentation of the project and initial implementation with 12 municipalities (of 39 described in the project) for formation and incidence processes; 26 groups formed (cooperatives and social organizations) in 39 municipalities; each group has 30-40 participants who will be trained; study circles implemented and functioning; definition of the strategy for political advocacy; training curricular defined with themes, scope and other methodologies; allies have been identified in the territories that are interested in joining the work. 537 people have participated in 23 study circle groups and advocacy dialogue, mobilisations and festivals have been carried out.

EuropeAid - Strengthening of social organisations for the construction of democratic societies for the right to housing and adequate housing in El Salvador. The action, aims to strengthen the efforts of CSOs for the defence of the human right to adequate housing and habitats, promoting the participation of CSOs in political-decision-making spaces from which the implementation of actions that facilitate, at the national and local levels, access to habitable land and financing oriented to the improvement of the habitat by the population in a situation of poverty (50% are women and 35% are young), in a joint work with institutions of the Central Government, local governments and other relevant actors.

participating-org.narrative: Federación Salvadoreña de Cooperativas de Vivienda por Ayuda Mutua de R.L.
Fundación Salvadoreña de Desarrollo y Vivienda Mínima

activity-date.narrative: Planned end date of the activity
Planned start date of the activity
